doc:
Eve Gordon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eve_Gordon 0 Eve Gordon (also known as Eve Bennett-Gordon; born June 25, 1960) is an American actress. Her television roles include playing Marilyn Monroe in the Emmy Award-winning miniseries A Woman Named Jackie, Congressional aide Jordan Miller in the short-lived sitcom The Powers That Be, the mother of the title character in the drama series Felicity, and Monica Klain, the wife of Ron Klain (played by Kevin Spacey) in the 2008 Emmy Award-winning HBO film Recount. She also starred in the 1997 film Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves, starring opposite Rick Moranis. Eve_Gordon ( also_known as Eve_Bennett-Gordon ; born June_25_,_1960 ) is an_American_actress . Her_television_roles include_playing Marilyn_Monroe in the_Emmy_Award-winning_miniseries A_Woman Named Jackie , Congressional_aide_Jordan_Miller in the_short-lived_sitcom The_Powers That_Be , the_mother of the_title_character in the_drama_series_Felicity , and Monica_Klain , the_wife of Ron_Klain (_played by Kevin_Spacey_) in the_2008_Emmy_Award-winning_HBO_film_Recount . She also starred in the_1997_film_Honey , We Shrunk Ourselves , starring opposite_Rick_Moranis .
